product_overview: Om Chabahil Dental Hospital website is a modern, comprehensive dental clinic platform featuring a public-facing website and a robust admin panel for managing appointments, doctors, services, content, and other clinic operations. The system facilitates patient engagement through informative pages and multi-step appointment booking while enabling clinic staff to efficiently administer the siteâ€™s content and clinical schedules.
core_goals: Provide a user-friendly public website showcasing the clinic's services, doctors, and patient resources.
Enable patients to book appointments online through a secure, multi-step process.
Offer a secure and comprehensive admin panel for managing doctors, appointments, services, content, media, and users.
Ensure responsive design and accessibility across devices.
Maintain robust security with admin authentication, including two-factor and session management.
Streamline content management, including blog, gallery, testimonials, and SEO optimization.
key_features: Public website pages: Homepage, About, Services, Doctors, Patients, Gallery, Blog, Contact with relevant information and multimedia content.
Multi-step appointment booking system with doctor and service selection, scheduling, patient details, and confirmation.
Admin panel authentication with email/password, remember me, and forgot password flows.
Admin dashboard displaying analytics, recent appointments, and enquiries overview.
Doctors management: CRUD operations with status toggling.
Appointments management: viewing, filtering, status updates, and completion marking.
Services management: add/edit services with pricing, duration, and visibility controls.
Content management for hero, about, statistics, and SEO-enhanced pages.
Gallery management with media upload, categorization, visibility control, and deletion.
Blog management for post creation, editing, publishing, and unpublishing.
Testimonials management with rating and visibility settings.
Enquiries management with reply and archive functionalities.
Media library for file uploads and organization.
Admin users management with roles and password resets.
Settings management for contact info, social media, SEO, and security features like password change and two-factor authentication.
user_flow_summary: A visitor accesses the public website, browses pages like Homepage, Services, Doctors, Blog, and Contact to explore the clinic's offerings and information.
A patient navigates to the appointment booking page to select a doctor, service, date/time, and enters personal details to confirm an appointment.
An admin logs into the secure admin panel via email and password with optional remember me, and manages the clinic's operations through dashboard and various management sections.
Admin performs CRUD operations on doctors, services, blog posts, and testimonials, manages appointments by confirming, cancelling, or marking them as completed.
Admin manages content sections such as hero, about page, gallery media, and SEO-related settings to keep the site updated and optimized.
Admin uses security settings to manage passwords, enable two-factor authentication, and oversee active sessions for secure access.
validation_criteria: Public pages load successfully with all sections rendered correctly and content is accurate.
Appointment booking completes with correct data validation and confirmation flow.
Successful admin login and logout with appropriate authentication feedback.
Admin panel dashboard displays accurate statistics and recent activity.
CRUD operations on doctors, appointments, services, blog posts, and testimonials work as intended without errors.
Content management updates reflect immediately on the public-facing site.
Media uploads and categorization correctly associate and display media items.
Security features like password change and two-factor authentication enforce correct behavior.
Responsive design tested and verified across major devices and screen sizes.
Navigation menus function correctly on all pages and roles.

publicPages.name: Homepage
publicPages.description: Main landing page with hero, services, doctors, testimonials
